modName: NFG HIRAGANA and KATAKANA WarPaints - RaceMenu Overlay Plugins
summary: A repacking of Nfghjk's hiragana and katakana warpaint replacers into RaceMenu overlay plugins. All credit belongs to the original author, Nfghjk.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][u][b]Description[/b][/u][/size]

[size=4]This is a simple repackaging of Nfghjk's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57552/?]NFG HIRAGANA WarPaints[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57536/?]NFG KATAKANA WarPaints[/url] into RaceMenu overlays plugins. The original files are warpaint replacers and also included a reversed version of each, but I have not included these.

All credit for these belong to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/11547908]Nfghjk[/url]﻿. If you like them, [u][b][i]PLEASE[/i][/b] endorse the original files![/u][/size]


[u][b][size=6]Requirements[/size][/b][/u]

[size=4][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url][/size]


[u][b][size=6]Changelog[/size][/b][/u]

[u][b][size=4]Version 1.1[/size][/b][/u]
[size=4]Original textures were 2000x2000, which caused bad stuttering when selecting them in RaceMenu. Textures are now the proper 2048x2048 and load correctly.[/size]


[size=6][u][b]Installation[/b][/u][/size]

[size=4]There are 3 files:[/size]
[list][*][size=4]Kana (Both Hiragana and Katakana)[/size]
[/*]
[*][size=4]Hiragana Only[/size]
[/*]
[*][size=4]Katakana Only[/size]
[/*]
[/list]
[size=4]Install only ONE![/size]


[size=6][u][b]Hiragana[/b][/u][/size]

[size=4]あいうえお
かきくけこ
さしすせそ
たちつてと
なにぬねの
はひふへほ
まみむめも
やゆよ
らりるれろ
わゐゑを
ん[/size]

[size=6][u][b]Katakana[/b][/u][/size]

[size=4]アイウエオ
カキクケコ
サシスセソ
タチツテト
ナニヌネノ
ハヒフヘホ
マミムメモ
ヤユヨ
ラリルレロ
ワヲ
ン[/size]


[size=6][u][b]Credit[/b][/u][/size]

[size=4]As stated already, all credit belongs to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/11547908]Nfghjk[/url]﻿![/size]
author: Nfghjk
